title: Looking for a Clark Griffith Portrait or Joss
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: Looking for a Clark Griffith Portrait or Joss
posts.post_content: Looking for either a Griffith or Joss Portrait graded SGC 40 or PSA 3 (or somewhere in that neighborhood).  If anyone is looking to part with one of these let me know your price and a scan would be nice.  Thanks!
